title: #92Noon! Florio/Snob/Scott/BA/SandelinFam/Perk/Boudreau
description: Busy show! Florio begins, followed by Stump the Snob with Cory Cove and Meatsauce to finish first hour. Tony Scott from YouthHockeyHub on HS hockey, and Brian Arrigoni crushed that Hill Murray was ousted from Tourney gets us to final hour. Mavs forward Ryan Sandelin is joined by his dad(UMD head coach) Scott, Glen Perkins on Twins season and Bruce Boudreau ends the show!
